filebrowser.description:
FileBrowser: Web-based file management interface
Provides a secure web UI for browsing, uploading, and managing files

address.description: Address to bind the server to (empty means all interfaces)
address.title: address

baseURL.description: Base URL path for the filebrowser application
baseURL.title: baseURL

database.description: Path to the SQLite database file for storing filebrowser configuration
database.title: database

log.description: Log output destination (stdout, stderr, or file path)
log.title: log

port.description: Port on which the filebrowser application listens inside the container
port.title: port

root.description: Root directory that filebrowser will serve and manage files from
root.title: root

accessModes.description: Access modes for the database PVC
accessModes.title: accessModes

existingClaim.description: Existing claim name for the database PVC (if not creating a new one)
existingClaim.title: existingClaim

storageClassName.description: Storage class name for the database PVC
storageClassName.title: storageClassName

enabled.description: Enable the actual filebrowser deployment. Set to true to deploy the filebrowser component
enabled.title: enabled

fullnameOverride.title: fullnameOverride

image.description: Container image configuration for Filebrowser and related services

tag.description: Overrides the image tag whose default is the chart appVersion.
tag.title: tag

rollingUpdate.description: Rolling update configuration parameters. Only applicable when type is RollingUpdate.

oneOf.description: Maximum number of pods that can be created above the desired replica count as an absolute number
Maximum number of pods that can be created above the desired replica count as a percentage
Maximum number of pods that can be unavailable during the update as an absolute number
Maximum number of pods that can be unavailable during the update as a percentage

type.description: Type of deployment strategy. RollingUpdate gradually replaces old pods with new ones. Recreate terminates all old pods before creating new ones.

    - path: /SASRetrievalAgentManager/postgrest/monitoring(/|$)(.*) 
      pathType: ImplementationSpecific
